SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_com_table_select_config (com_id, table_id, select_ket, table_title, table_title_name, table_key, key_code, title_type, components_id, components_name, components_type, components_result, title_accept, search_api, sort_no, enableflg, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time) values (#{comId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tableId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{selectKet, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableTitleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{componentsId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{componentsName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{componentsType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{componentsResult, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{titleAccept, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{searchApi, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNo, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{enableflg, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sys_com_table_select_config set com_id=#{comId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, table_id=#{tableId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, select_ket=#{selectKet, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, table_title=#{tableTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, table_title_name=#{tableTitleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, table_key=#{tableKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key_code=#{keyCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title_type=#{titleType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, components_id=#{componentsId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, components_name=#{componentsName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, components_type=#{componentsType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, components_result=#{componentsResult, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title_accept=#{titleAccept, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, search_api=#{searchApi, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort_no=#{sortNo, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, enableflg=#{enableflg, jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by=#{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_time=#{createdTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by=#{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_time=#{updatedTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
